original_text: Do not quarrel with other people if they have done nothing to hurt you. You have no reason to accuse them of anything wrong.
korean_text: 사람이 네게 악을 행하지 아니하였거든 까닭 없이 더불어 다투지 말며

sentences.original_text: Do not quarrel with other people
if they have done nothing to hurt you
to accuse them of anything wrong
